title: Simple Key
effect: Opens certain locked doors and grates around Hallownest.

title: Elegant Key
effect: Unlocks a sealed chamber in the City of Tears.

title: Love Key
effect: Opens a love-themed chamber deep in the Gardens.

title: Shopkeeper's Key
effect: Returns more stock to a certain shop when delivered.

title: City Crest
summary: A seal bearing the City’s mark.
effect: Can be placed to open a gate into the City of Tears.

title: King's Brand
effect: Grants royal permission—opens the way to the Abyss.

title: Tram Pass
effect: Activates trams that connect distant regions.

title: Lumafly Lantern
effect: Illuminates dark caverns and rooms.

title: Map and Quill
effect: Allows updating the map at benches and buying regional maps.

title: Collector's Map
effect: Marks Grub locations on the map.

title: Hunter's Journal
effect: Records entries for defeated creatures and bosses.

title: Hunter's Mark
effect: Marks completion of the Journal with the Hunter’s approval.

title: Delicate Flower
effect: Can be delivered intact for a special reward; breaks on damage or stag use.

title: Ruined Flower
effect: A broken form of the Delicate Flower—no longer accepted.

title: Godtuner
effect: Tracks attunement to gods and grants access to pantheons.

title: Dream Nail
effect: Cuts into dreams, collects Essence and reveals hidden thoughts.

title: Mask Shard
effect: Combine four to forge a new mask of health.

title: Vessel Fragment
effect: Combine three to expand the SOUL vessel.

title: Salubra's Blessing
effect: Bestows a comfort when resting at benches after earning her favor.

title: Pale Ore
effect: Used by the Nailsmith to upgrade the Nail.

title: Rancid Egg
effect: Can be traded to recover lost shade under certain conditions.

title: Wanderer's Journal
effect: Valuable to collectors—sell for Geo.

title: Hallownest Seal
effect: Valuable to collectors—sell for Geo.

title: King's Idol
effect: Valuable to collectors—sell for Geo.

title: Arcane Egg
effect: Highly prized by scholars—sell for a high price.
